artist: Artist: Takehara Shunchōsai; Artist: Niwa Tōkei (double pages 3, 6, 8 etc); Artist: Takehara Shunsensai (double pages 35, 39); Author: Akisato Ritō
creditline: Gift of Captain G. B. Powell, Jr., JAGC, USA
description: soft-bound book with light blue cover; white label with black text on cover; some text pages; page of text with decorative border of jumping carp near front of book; images include two cranes in front of large building with view of water with boats in URQ, men on horseback viewing a stone (?), people in a large boat, aerial views of landscapes and buildings, people at a restaurant, expansive view with people walking over a bridge and sailboats, procession with figures wearing decorated hats, mock battle with soldiers with staffs, boats and people swimming
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
portfolio: From Pictorial Guide to Famous Sights in Settsu (Settsu meisho zue 摂津名所圖會)
text: Devoted to Sumiyoshi Province 住吉郡. Niwa Tokei designed the double pages 3, 6, 8, 11, 14, 15, 16, 26b, 27, 30, 31, 32, 40, 44, 47, 49, 51, 64.
title: Pictorial Guide to Famous Sights in Settsu, vol. 1
